description: Add event. Parameters: Event title, date, time, location.
prompts: I have a 'Meeting' on May 25th at 10:00 AM at the office.
I'm having 'Lunch with Sarah' on June 10th at 12:30 PM at the restaurant.
There's a 'Conference Call' on July 15th at 3:00 PM in the conference room.
Schedule a 'Project Review' meeting for tomorrow at 9:00 AM in the boardroom.
I'll be having 'Dinner with Family' at 7:00 PM at home on Friday evening.

description: Edit event. Parameters: Event title.
prompts: Update the details of the 'Team Meeting' scheduled for next Monday.
Change the time of the 'Training Session' to 4:00 PM.
Move the 'Birthday Party' to the park.
My 'Doctor Appointment' is actually on August 20th.
The event on September 5th is a 'Product Launch'.

description: Delete event. Parameter: Event title.
prompts: Remove the 'Dentist Appointment' from my calendar.
Cancel the 'Conference' scheduled for next Wednesday.
Get rid of the 'Networking Event' on July 30th.
Delete the meeting scheduled for tomorrow morning.
Take off the 'Gym Session' from my calendar.

description: View day.
prompts: What's on my schedule for today?
Show me my events for tomorrow.
What are my plans for Monday?
Show me what's on my calendar for Friday.
Show me my events for this weekend.

description: View week.
prompts: Show me my calendar for this week.
What's my schedule for next week?
Show me the events for the week starting on June 1st.
What are my appointments for the current week?
What's planned for the upcoming week?

description: View month.
prompts: Show me my calendar for May.
What's on my calendar for June?
Show me my schedule for August.
Show me my appointments for September.
What are the events for October?

description: View year.
prompts: Show me my calendar for 2024.
What's on my calendar for next year?
Show me my calendar for 2025.
Show me my appointments for 2026.
Show me the events for 2027.

description: View agenda.
prompts: What's on my agenda today?
Show me my agenda for tomorrow.
What's on my agenda for next Monday?
What's on my agenda for Friday?
Show me my agenda for the week.

description: Search events. Parameter: Search query.
prompts: Find events related to 'project meeting'.
Show me events with 'birthday' in the title.
Find 'doctor appointment' events.
Search for events related to 'conference'.
Find events with 'family' in the title.

description: Share event. Parameter: Event title.
prompts: Share the 'Team Lunch' event with Sarah.
Send the 'Training Workshop' event details to John.
Share the 'Product Launch' agenda with the team.
Send my manager the 'Client Meeting' details.
Share the 'Company Picnic' schedule with everyone on the team.

description: Set reminder. Parameters: Event title, reminder time.
prompts: Remind me about the 'Doctor Appointment' tomorrow at 10:00 AM.
Set a reminder for the 'Team Meeting' on Friday at 3:00 PM.
Remind me about the 'Dentist Visit' on Monday at 9:00 AM.
Give me a reminder about the 'Project Deadline' event next week.
Remind me about the 'Conference Call' in 30 minutes.

description: Repeat event. Parameters: Event title, recurrence.
prompts: Make the 'Weekly Review' happen every Monday.
Repeat the 'Gym Session' every weekday.
Have the 'Team Standup' repeat every day.
Repeat the 'Client Meeting' every two weeks.
Make the 'Monthly Report' repeat every month on the 1st.

description: Add contacts to event. Parameters: Event title, contact list.
prompts: Invite Sarah, John, and Emily to the 'Team Lunch'.
Invite all team members to the 'Product Demo'.
Invite clients to the 'Networking Event' next week.
Add Mark and Lisa to the 'Project Kickoff' meeting.
Send invitations for the 'Company Party' to all employees.

description: Set event priority. Parameters: Event title, priority level.
prompts: Make the 'Project Meeting' a high priority.
Set the 'Team Offsite' as low priority.
Mark the 'Deadline Reminder' as medium priority.
Set the 'Client Presentation' to high priority.
Set the 'Training Session' as low priority.

description: Add note to event. Parameters: Event title, note text.
prompts: Add a note 'Bring presentation slides' to the 'Client Meeting'.
Add a note 'Prepare agenda' to the 'Team Discussion' event.
Add a note 'Bring laptop' to the 'Conference Call'.
Add a note 'Review project proposal' to the 'Business Review' event.
Add a note 'Wear formal attire' to the 'Company Dinner' event.

description: Set event color. Parameters: Event title, color choice.
prompts: Make the 'Team Meeting' blue.
Change the color of the 'Training Session' to green.
Set the 'Client Presentation' to red.
Change the color of the 'Product Launch' to yellow.
Set the color of the 'Company Retreat' to purple.

description: Set event duration. Parameters: Event title, duration.
prompts: Extend the 'Training Workshop' by an hour.
Make the 'Project Review' 30 minutes long.
Set the duration of the 'Team Building' to 3 hours.
Make the 'Client Meeting' 2 hours long.
Shorten the 'Conference Call' by 15 minutes.

description: Mark event as completed. Parameter: Event title.
prompts: I finished the 'Training Session'.
Mark the 'Team Building' as done.
I'm done with the 'Product Demo'.
The 'Project Review' is complete.
Mark the 'Client Meeting' as finished.

description: Copy event. Parameter: Event title.
prompts: Copy the 'Team Meeting'.
Duplicate the 'Project Kickoff' meeting.
Make a copy of the 'Client Presentation'.
Duplicate the 'Training Workshop'.
Make a copy of the 'Product Demo'.

description: Create new calendar. Parameter: Calendar name.
prompts: Create a calendar named 'Work'.
Add a new calendar called 'Personal'.
Create a calendar called 'Fitness'.
Make a calendar named 'Family'.
Create a 'Travel' calendar.

description: Delete calendar. Parameter: Calendar name.
prompts: Delete the 'Work' calendar.
Remove the 'Personal' calendar.
Delete the 'Fitness' calendar.
Remove the 'Family' calendar.
Delete the 'Travel' calendar.

description: Toggle calendar visibility. Parameter: Calendar name.
prompts: Hide the 'Work' calendar.
Show the 'Personal' calendar.
Hide the 'Fitness' calendar.
Show the 'Family' calendar.
Hide the 'Travel' calendar.

description: Share calendar. Parameters: Calendar name, contact.
prompts: Share the 'Work' calendar with Sarah.
Send the 'Personal' calendar to John.
Share the 'Fitness' calendar with Emily.
Let Mark see the 'Family' calendar.
Share the 'Travel' calendar with Lisa.

description: Unsubscribe from calendar. Parameter: Calendar name.
prompts: Unsubscribe from the 'Work' calendar.
Stop subscribing to the 'Personal' calendar.
Unsubscribe from the 'Fitness' calendar.
Remove 'Family' calendar subscription.
Unsubscribe from 'Travel' calendar.

description: Set time zone. Parameter: Time zone selection.
prompts: Switch to Eastern Standard Time.
Set the time zone to Pacific Time.
Use Central European Time.
Set the time zone to Australian Eastern Standard Time.
Change the time zone to Indian Standard Time.

description: View weather forecast. Parameter: Time.
prompts: Show me the weather for tomorrow.
What's the weather forecast?
What will the weather be like this week?
How's the weather going to be next weekend?
What's the weather for the month?

description: Set event alert. Parameters: Event title, alert time.
prompts: Alert me 15 minutes before the 'Team Meeting'.
Remind me 30 minutes before the 'Project Kickoff' meeting.
Give me an hour reminder for the 'Client Presentation'.
Alert me 10 minutes before the 'Training Workshop'.
Give me a 20-minute reminder for the 'Product Demo'.

description: Add attachment to event. Parameters: Event title, attachment file.
prompts: Attach the agenda to the 'Team Meeting'.
Include the presentation slides for 'Project Kickoff'.
Attach the handouts to 'Client Presentation'.
Add the training materials to 'Training Workshop'.
Include the product brochure in 'Product Demo'.

description: Add task to event. Parameters: Event title, task details.
prompts: Add a task 'Prepare Presentation' to the 'Team Meeting'.
Include 'Send Invitations' task for 'Project Kickoff'.
Add a 'Finalize Report' task to 'Client Presentation'.
Add a 'Setup Equipment' task to 'Training Workshop'.
Add a 'Arrange Demo Setup' task to 'Product Demo'.

description: View task list. Parameters: Event title.
prompts: Show me the tasks for the 'Team Meeting'.
Show me the tasks for 'Project Kickoff'.
Show me the tasks for 'Client Presentation'.
Show me the tasks for 'Training Workshop'.
Show me the tasks for 'Product Demo'.

description: Delete task. Parameter: Task title.
prompts: Remove 'Prepare Presentation' from the list.
Delete 'Send Invitations' from 'Project Kickoff'.
Remove 'Finalize Report' from the list.
Delete 'Setup Equipment' from 'Training Workshop'.
Remove 'Arrange Demo Setup' from the list.

description: Mark task as completed. Parameter: Task title.
prompts: Mark 'Prepare Presentation' as done.
I finished 'Send Invitations' for 'Project Kickoff'.
Mark 'Finalize Report' as complete.
Mark 'Setup Equipment' as done for 'Training Workshop'.
Mark 'Arrange Demo Setup' as finished.

description: Set task due date. Parameters: Task title, due date.
prompts: Set 'Prepare Presentation' due tomorrow.
Set 'Send Invitations' due next week.
Set 'Finalize Report' due at the end of the month.
Set 'Setup Equipment' due next Wednesday.
Set 'Arrange Demo Setup' due on Friday.

description: Set task priority. Parameters: Task title, priority level.
prompts: Set 'Prepare Presentation' as high priority.
Set the priority level for 'Send Invitations' in 'Project Kickoff'.
Make 'Finalize Report' a low priority.
Set the priority for 'Setup Equipment' in 'Training Workshop'.
Set 'Arrange Demo Setup' as medium priority.

description: View task details. Parameter: Task title.
prompts: What are the details of 'Prepare Presentation'?
Show me the details for 'Send Invitations' in 'Project Kickoff'.
What are the details of 'Finalize Report'?
Give me the details for 'Setup Equipment' in 'Training Workshop'.
What are the details of 'Arrange Demo Setup'?

description: Add subtask. Parameters: Task title, subtask title.
prompts: Add a 'Create Slides' subtask to 'Prepare Presentation'.
Include 'Send Emails' as a subtask of 'Send Invitations'.
Add 'Gather Data' as a subtask of 'Finalize Report'.
Add 'Check Equipment' as a subtask of 'Setup Equipment'.
Add 'Test Software' as a subtask of 'Arrange Demo Setup'.

description: Delete subtask. Parameters: Task title, subtask title.
prompts: Remove 'Create Slides' from the list.
Delete 'Send Emails' from 'Send Invitations'.
Remove 'Gather Data' from the list.
Delete 'Check Equipment' from 'Setup Equipment'.
Remove 'Test Software' from the list.

description: Mark subtask as completed. Parameters: Task title, subtask title.
prompts: Mark 'Create Slides' as finished.
I finished 'Send Emails' for 'Send Invitations'.
Mark 'Gather Data' as done.
Mark 'Check Equipment' as done for 'Setup Equipment'.
Mark 'Test Software' as finished.

description: Set subtask due date. Parameters: Task title, subtask title.
prompts: Set 'Create Slides' due tomorrow.
Set 'Send Emails' due next week.
Set 'Gather Data' due at the end of the month.
Set 'Check Equipment' due next Wednesday.
Set 'Test Software' due on Friday.

description: View subtask details. Parameters: Task title, subtask title.
prompts: Show me the details of 'Create Slides'.
Show me the details of 'Send Emails' for 'Send Invitations'.
What are the details of 'Gather Data'?
What's involved in 'Check Equipment' for 'Setup Equipment'?
What's the breakdown of 'Test Software'?
